column1: "description": "This table provides the Projected Refining Capacity during Twelfth Five Year Plan (2012-17) in Million Metric Tonne Per Annum (MMTPA). It gives the projected capacity for the years 2012 to 2017"
"title": "Download XLS for Projected Refining Capacity during Twelfth Five Year Plan (2012-17) (MMTPA)"
